About Me

Let me tell you a few things

BIO

My name is Bryce Campbell. As a computer science student I have always pushed myself to do my best. I strive to make each mistake an opportunity to learn and each project I tackle better than the last. Relaxed and perseverant, I have always been driven by a desire to improve myself and satiate my endless curiosity. A problem I can’t solve is a problem I can’t ignore and being told something isn’t possible only proves to me that it is.

LIDAR Data Analyst

Continental Mapping Consultants, Inc.

As a Lidar Data Analyst at Continental Mapping Consultants, Inc. I worked hard to surpass expectations and beat my deadlines. I provided thousands of miles of processed LIDAR data at execlent quality.

Computer Science Major

California Polytechnic State University

  • Discrete Structures (In Progress)
  • Technical Writing (In Progress)
  • Systems Programming
